I couldn't find mediacoder with gpu support, got a link? their site doesn't mention gpu at all.

There are more apps now encoding with gpu (better than this one) 

Cyberlink powerdirector for example

I checked out Mediacoder - not opensource (free though) and no GPU encoder.

Cyberlink Powerdirector is a good choice to convert using the hardware. It's also got some great functions made easy like video denoise, enhanced upscale, motion stabiliser etc.
The crack is included in there (you have to replace the exe)

THIS SOFTWARE WILL NOT WORK PROPERLY WITH THE LATEST NVIDIA DRIVERS. TRY AT YOUR RISK!

The Badaboom System Check reads Drivers wrongly. For example, the current latest NV drivers are 258.96. SysCheck reads it as 158.96 and Badaboom requires drivers above 177.xx.

As a result, I had trouble converting a movie to my PSP, it failed thrice before converting successfully. I'm yet to test whether the movie is playable though.

The Badaboom team has already fixed this in their latest version. So either-

A) Wait for the latest version to release.
B) Roll back your graphic card drivers to anything below 200.00.

~~~~~~~~~DO NOT DOWNLOAD~~~~~~~~~~~

AVG free and Microsoft Security Essentials both say that the .rar file have viruses

the .rar file HAS viruses
(sorry for the $H!T grammar)
